ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, great ideas have a way of becoming great products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish.

ul.li: The Platform Infrastructure Engineering group designs, builds and operates the cloud infrastructure that hosts Apple consumer facing applications. We are looking for skilled Unix/Linux administrator to join a team of highly experienced and effective engineers who are passionate and creative about delivering service. Challenges of scale are solved through automation, attention to detail, and the strength of a fully integrated data center, network, compute and application stack.

div.p: Experience in understanding how applications operate across distributed resources in diverse geographies, willingness to personally support the platform, and create and tune the tools and monitoring will make you a successful candidate. You will own projects for their full lifecycle and will be responsible for end to end deployment of servers and networks.
B.S. Computer Science or equivalent experience
